thread.title: Tara Wallace Addresses Rumors She’s Expecting Fourth Child With Peter Gunz
thread.title_full: Tara Wallace Addresses Rumors She’s Expecting Fourth Child With Peter Gunz

author: Jessica Bennett
title: Tara Wallace Addresses Rumors She’s Expecting Fourth Child With Peter Gunz
text:
February 23, 2017 by Jessica Bennett 0 Shares Advertisement 
The Season 7 finale of Love & Hip Hop found Tara Wallace and ex Peter Gunz in a good space, so much so that fans believe they’re giving their troubled relationship another try. 
Many also believe Tara is pregnant with the serial cheater’s eleventh child , a rumor she’s finally addressing head-on. 

Tara clears the air on rumors of she and Peter reconciling, saying they definitely are not together, but are respectful and cordial for the sake of their three sons, according to HollywoodLife . 
“We see each other very often. He picks the kids up in the morning and we do stuff all together. The kids need to see you getting along and not just fighting. We do birthday dinners together and if there are days we don’t have stuff to do, we may take them to the movies together.” 
Credit: VH1 
She also says she’s simply too busy to give Peter, or any other man for that matter, the time of day right now. 
“I have so much going on. As much as I’d like to date, it’s not easiest thing. When I do get out I like to go things I like to do, with my girlfriends. I’ve never been a serial dater and I won’t start now. I’m staying true to myself.” 
Credit: Instagram 
The author also claims she is NOT pregnant by the 50-year-old playboy, whose current wife Amina Buddafly gave birth to his tenth child, Bronx Pankey , this season. 

When one internet troll accused the mother of trying to trap Peter with another baby, she clapped back saying people shouldn’t believe everything they hear. 
A post shared by Fameolous Entertainment (@fameolousent_) on Feb 22, 2017 at 12:02pm PST 
Peter realized Tara was the one he wanted shortly after Amina gave birth, asking for another chance with his girlfriend of 13 years. She initially told him no, and appears to be sticking to her guns. 
Still, the Bronx rapper is a determined man, and only time will tell if she’s able to resist his charms for long. 
Feb 21, 2017 at 4:15pm PST 
Do you think these two will start dating again? Sound off below. 

The Love & Hip Hop Reunion airs Monday at 8 p.m. ET on VH1.
